FetchingAccountNumberAndPolicyIDFromSTG:
SELECT A.ACCOUNT_NUMBER,A.POLICY_ID,A.LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,A.LOB_ID,A.ISO_CURRENCY_CD,A.PRODUCT_ID,A.LOCATION_ID,A.REINSURANCE_CONTRACT_ID,
          A.POLICY_TERM,A.N_INSURED_ENTITY_ID,A.N_ONER_CLASSIFICATION_ID,START_DATE,END_DATE,A.as_of_date
          from 
          (SELECT fsi_endw.as_of_date,FSI_ENDW.ACCOUNT_NUMBER,FSI_ENDW.POLICY_ID,FSI_ENDW.LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,FSI_ENDW.LOB_ID,FSI_ENDW.ISO_CURRENCY_CD,
          FSI_ENDW.PRODUCT_ID,FSI_ENDW.LOCATION_ID,CASE WHEN FSI_ENDW.REINSURANCE_CONTRACT_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 1
          ELSE 0 END REINS_HELD_IND,NVL(FSI_ENDW.REINSURANCE_POLICY_ID,-1) AS REINSURANCE_CONTRACT_ID,
          FSI_ENDW.EFFECTIVE_DATE as start_date,FSI_ENDW.MATURITY_DATE as end_date,
          CEIL((FSI_ENDW.MATURITY_DATE-FSI_ENDW.EFFECTIVE_DATE)/365) AS POLICY_TERM,null as N_INSURED_ENTITY_ID,FSI_ENDW.N_ONER_CLASSIFICATION_ID
          FROM FSI_D_ENDOWMENT_POLICIES FSI_ENDW 
        UNION ALL
         SELECT FSI_WHL.as_of_date,FSI_WHL.ACCOUNT_NUMBER,FSI_WHL.POLICY_ID,FSI_WHL.LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,FSI_WHL.LOB_ID,FSI_WHL.ISO_CURRENCY_CD,
          FSI_WHL.PRODUCT_ID,FSI_WHL.LOCATION_ID,CASE WHEN FSI_WHL.REINSURANCE_CONTRACT_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 1
          ELSE 0 END REINS_HELD_IND,NVL(FSI_WHL.REINSURANCE_POLICY_ID,-1) AS REINSURANCE_CONTRACT_ID,
          FSI_WHL.EFFECTIVE_DATE as start_date,FSI_WHL.MATURITY_DATE as end_date,
          CEIL((FSI_WHL.MATURITY_DATE-FSI_WHL.EFFECTIVE_DATE)/365) AS POLICY_TERM,null as N_INSURED_ENTITY_ID,FSI_WHL.N_ONER_CLASSIFICATION_ID
          FROM FSI_D_WHOLELIFE_POLICIES FSI_WHL 
          UNION ALL
          SELECT FSI_ISSD.as_of_date,FSI_ISSD.ACCOUNT_NUMBER,FSI_ISSD.POLICY_ID,FSI_ISSD.LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,FSI_ISSD.LOB_ID,FSI_ISSD.ISO_CURRENCY_CD,
          FSI_ISSD.PRODUCT_ID,FSI_ISSD.LOCATION_ID,0 as REINS_HELD_IND,-1 AS REINSURANCE_CONTRACT_ID,
          FSI_ISSD.START_DATE as START_DATE,FSI_ISSD.EXPIRY_DATE as end_date,
          CEIL((FSI_ISSD.EXPIRY_DATE-FSI_ISSD.START_DATE)/365) AS POLICY_TERM,FSI_ISSD.INSURED_ENTITY_ID AS N_INSURED_ENTITY_ID,FSI_ISSD.N_ONER_CLASSIFICATION_ID
          FROM FSI_D_REINS_CONTRACTS_ISSUED FSI_ISSD 
         UNION ALL
          SELECT FSI_PROP.as_of_date,FSI_PROP.ACCOUNT_NUMBER,FSI_PROP.POLICY_ID,FSI_PROP.LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,FSI_PROP.LOB_ID,FSI_PROP.ISO_CURRENCY_CD,
          FSI_PROP.PRODUCT_ID,FSI_PROP.LOCATION_ID,CASE WHEN FSI_PROP.REINSURANCE_CONTRACT_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 1
          ELSE 0 END REINS_HELD_IND,NVL(FSI_PROP.REINSURANCE_POLICY_ID,-1) AS REINSURANCE_CONTRACT_ID,
          FSI_PROP.ISSUE_DATE as start_date,FSI_PROP.MATURITY_DATE as end_date,
          CEIL((FSI_PROP.MATURITY_DATE-FSI_PROP.ISSUE_DATE)/365) AS POLICY_TERM,null AS N_INSURED_ENTITY_ID,FSI_PROP.N_ONER_CLASSIFICATION_ID
          FROM FSI_D_PROP_CASUALTY_CONTRACTS FSI_PROP 
          UNION ALL
          SELECT fsi_rtrm.as_of_date,FSI_RTRM.ACCOUNT_NUMBER,FSI_RTRM.POLICY_ID,FSI_RTRM.LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,FSI_RTRM.LOB_ID,FSI_RTRM.ISO_CURRENCY_CD,
          FSI_RTRM.PRODUCT_ID,FSI_RTRM.LOCATION_ID,CASE WHEN FSI_RTRM.REINSURANCE_CONTRACT_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 1
          ELSE 0 END REINS_HELD_IND,NVL(FSI_RTRM.REINSURANCE_POLICY_ID,-1) AS REINSURANCE_CONTRACT_ID,
          FSI_RTRM.ISSUE_DATE as start_date,FSI_RTRM.MATURITY_DATE as end_date,
          CEIL((FSI_RTRM.MATURITY_DATE-FSI_RTRM.ISSUE_DATE)/365) AS POLICY_TERM,null as N_INSURED_ENTITY_ID,FSI_RTRM.N_ONER_CLASSIFICATION_ID
          FROM FSI_D_INS_RETIREMENT_CONTRACTS FSI_RTRM 
           UNION ALL
          SELECT fsi_anlty.as_of_date,FSI_ANLTY.ACCOUNT_NUMBER,FSI_ANLTY.POLICY_ID,FSI_ANLTY.LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,FSI_ANLTY.LOB_ID,FSI_ANLTY.ISO_CURRENCY_CD,
          FSI_ANLTY.PRODUCT_ID,FSI_ANLTY.LOCATION_ID,CASE WHEN FSI_ANLTY.REINSURANCE_CONTRACT_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 1
          ELSE 0 END REINS_HELD_IND,NVL(FSI_ANLTY.REINSURANCE_POLICY_ID,-1) AS REINSURANCE_CONTRACT_ID,
          FSI_ANLTY.EFFECTIVE_DATE as start_date,FSI_ANLTY.MATURITY_DATE as end_date,
          CEIL((FSI_ANLTY.MATURITY_DATE-FSI_ANLTY.EFFECTIVE_DATE)/365) AS POLICY_TERM,null as N_INSURED_ENTITY_ID,FSI_ANLTY.N_ONER_CLASSIFICATION_ID
          FROM FSI_D_INS_ANNUITY_CONTRACTS FSI_ANLTY 
          UNION ALL
          SELECT fsi_hlth.as_of_date,FSI_HLTH.ACCOUNT_NUMBER,FSI_HLTH.POLICY_ID,FSI_HLTH.LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,FSI_HLTH.LOB_ID,FSI_HLTH.ISO_CURRENCY_CD,
          FSI_HLTH.PRODUCT_ID,FSI_HLTH.LOCATION_ID,CASE WHEN FSI_HLTH.REINSURANCE_CONTRACT_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 1
          ELSE 0 END REINS_HELD_IND,NVL(FSI_HLTH.REINSURANCE_POLICY_ID,-1) AS REINSURANCE_CONTRACT_ID,
          FSI_HLTH.EFFECTIVE_DATE as start_date,FSI_HLTH.MATURITY_DATE as end_date,
          CEIL((FSI_HLTH.MATURITY_DATE-FSI_HLTH.EFFECTIVE_DATE)/365) AS POLICY_TERM,null as N_INSURED_ENTITY_ID,FSI_HLTH.N_ONER_CLASSIFICATION_ID
          FROM FSI_D_HEALTH_INS_CONTRACTS FSI_HLTH 
          UNION ALL
          SELECT fsi_term.as_of_date,FSI_TERM.ACCOUNT_NUMBER,FSI_TERM.POLICY_ID,FSI_TERM.LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,FSI_TERM.LOB_ID,FSI_TERM.ISO_CURRENCY_CD,
          FSI_TERM.PRODUCT_ID,FSI_TERM.LOCATION_ID,CASE WHEN FSI_TERM.REINSURANCE_CONTRACT_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 1
          ELSE 0 END REINS_HELD_IND,NVL(FSI_TERM.REINSURANCE_POLICY_ID,-1) AS REINSURANCE_CONTRACT_ID,
          FSI_TERM.EFFECTIVE_DATE as start_date,FSI_TERM.MATURITY_DATE as end_date,
          CEIL((FSI_TERM.MATURITY_DATE-FSI_TERM.EFFECTIVE_DATE)/365) AS POLICY_TERM,null as N_INSURED_ENTITY_ID,FSI_TERM.N_ONER_CLASSIFICATION_ID
          FROM FSI_D_TERM_POLICIES FSI_TERM 
         )A
FetchColumnNames:
SELECT OBJ.CSM_OBJECTIVE TAB_NAME,  
  A1.CSM_OBJ_CATEGORY SEC_NAME,
  A2.VAR_IDENTIFIER_NAME ATTR_IDENTIFIER,
  A2.OUTPUT_VARIABLE_NAME ATTR_NAME,
  A3.OUTPUT_VARIABLE_FORMULA ATTR_EXPRESSION,  
  A2.MLS_CD MLS_CD,
  A2.REINS_FLG,A3.CSM_CALC_TEMPLATE_ID
FROM FSI_CSM_OBJECTIVE_MLS OBJ 
LEFT OUTER JOIN
  (SELECT CAT.CSM_OBJ_CATEGORY_CD,
    CAT.CSM_OBJ_CATEGORY,
    CAT_MAP.CSM_OBJECTIVE_CD,
    CAT_MAP.OBJ_CATEGORY_SEQUENCE,
    CAT.MLS_CD
  FROM FSI_CSM_OBJ_CATEGORY_MLS CAT,
    FSI_OBJ_CATEGORY_OBJ_MAP CAT_MAP
  WHERE CAT.CSM_OBJ_CATEGORY_CD = CAT_MAP.CSM_OBJ_CATEGORY_CD
  ORDER BY CAT_MAP.CSM_OBJ_CATEGORY_CD,
    CAT_MAP.OBJ_CATEGORY_SEQUENCE
  ) A1
ON ( OBJ.CSM_OBJECTIVE_CD = A1.CSM_OBJECTIVE_CD
AND OBJ.MLS_CD            = A1.MLS_CD )
LEFT OUTER JOIN
  (SELECT VAR.OUTPUT_VARIABLE_CODE,
    VAR.OUTPUT_VARIABLE_NAME,
    VAR_MP.CSM_OBJECTIVE_CD,
    VAR_MP.CSM_OBJ_CATEGORY_CD,
    VAR_MP.CSM_METHOD_CD,
    VAR_MP.VAR_SEQUENCE,
    VAR_MP.VAR_IDENTIFIER_NAME,
    VAR.MLS_CD,
    VAR_MP.EVALUATION_SEQUENCE,
    VAR_MP.ENABLED_FLG,
    VAR_MP.DEFAULT_FORMULA,
    VAR.DEFAULT_CONSTANT,
    VAR_MP.CALC_ONEROUS,
    VAR_MP.REINS_FLG
  FROM FSI_CSM_OUTPUT_VARIABLES_MLS VAR,
    (SELECT VAR_MAP.OUTPUT_VARIABLE_CODE,
      VAR_MAP.CSM_OBJECTIVE_CD,
      VAR_MAP.CSM_OBJ_CATEGORY_CD,
      VAR_MAP.CSM_METHOD_CD,
      VAR_MAP.VAR_SEQUENCE,
      A.VAR_IDENTIFIER_NAME,
      VAR_MAP.EVALUATION_SEQUENCE,
      VAR_MAP.ENABLED_FLG,
      VAR_MAP.DEFAULT_FORMULA,
      VAR_MAP.CALC_ONEROUS,
      VAR_MAP.REINS_FLG
    FROM FSI_CSM_OUTPUT_VARIABLES_CD A 
    JOIN FSI_CSM_OUTPUT_VAR_METHOD_MAP VAR_MAP
    ON (A.OUTPUT_VARIABLE_CODE=VAR_MAP.OUTPUT_VARIABLE_CODE)
    ) VAR_MP
  WHERE VAR.OUTPUT_VARIABLE_CODE = VAR_MP.OUTPUT_VARIABLE_CODE
  ORDER BY CSM_OBJECTIVE_CD,
    CSM_OBJ_CATEGORY_CD,
    CSM_METHOD_CD,
    VAR_SEQUENCE ASC
  ) A2 ON ( OBJ.CSM_OBJECTIVE_CD = A2.CSM_OBJECTIVE_CD
AND A1.CSM_OBJ_CATEGORY_CD       = A2.CSM_OBJ_CATEGORY_CD
AND OBJ.MLS_CD                   = A2.MLS_CD )
LEFT OUTER JOIN
  (SELECT CSM_CALC_TEMPLATE_ID,
    OUTPUT_VARIABLE_CODE,
    OUTPUT_VARIABLE_FORMULA
  FROM FSI_CSM_CALC_TEMPLATE_DETAILS  
  ) A3
ON A3.OUTPUT_VARIABLE_CODE = A2.OUTPUT_VARIABLE_CODE
